translations: v.跌跌撞撞地走，摸索；犯愚蠢的错误，出漏子；误入，不小心陷入（困境）

sentences.sentence: It had been a monumental blunder to give him the assignment.
sentences.translation: 分配给他这项任务是一个巨大的错误。

sentences.sentence: She cast a sidelong glance at Eric to see if he had noticed her blunder.
sentences.translation: 她偷偷斜扫了埃里克一眼，看他有没有留意到她的错误。

sentences.sentence: I think he made a tactical blunder by announcing it so far ahead of time.
sentences.translation: 我认为他如此提早宣布消息是犯了战术上的错误。
